column1:
Odeinoichus,"2018-07-15T22:18:03.59Z","Decent for Parts and Characters, not much else.","

Set #30530 WU-CRU Target Training: Ninjago this year has incorporated the looks of the LEGO Ninjago Movie and some fans are a bit put off by that. This fan however doesn’t mind the change they’ve made, it has allowed for a change in aesthetic which has helped to breathe new life into the Ninjago theme. At least in my opinion.
Pros:

column2: Set includes two Minifigures in WU-CRU Training Gi.
Model works fairly well with a fun play gimmick.
Lloyd has new head and hair piece first seen in LEGO Ninjago Movie.
Nya features new head from LEGO Ninjago Movie with original hair piece from Ninjago Theme.

column1: Cons:

column2: Limited weaponry included with set.
Model is small and doesn’t use fairly a large number of parts considering the price.

column1: Overall opinion

This is a great Polybag for Minifigures and WU-CRU Training Gi bodies. It is however weak in that the model itself is very small, the gimmick used is nice, but only has two options for practicing targets, a target and a bag, it might have been interesting to also see a practice dummy included with the set. Overall though I’d still recommend the Polybag, should you be able to find one.
